parameters.query: SELECT id, booking_id, user_id, message, channel, recipient, priority, payload, retry_count FROM notification_queue WHERE status = 'pending' AND (next_retry_at IS NULL OR next_retry_at <= NOW()) ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
UPDATE notification_queue SET status = 'sent', sent_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1::uuid;
